thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Samuel Painchaud

author: Samuel Painchaud
title: Samuel Painchaud
text:
I've booked many flights and vacation packages with you guys(FlightNetwork) and I'm always happy with the whole experience. It's very simple and the price matching program is very nice also(no regrets, or having to wait to buy tickets).
This week I booked a flight(with a transfer). The next day a very nice gentleman name Pankaj Gupta called me to let me know that my transfer was going to be a little to close for comfort. So he suggested to change my connection giving me a little more time to make the next flight, and he did the whole thing without me having to lift a finger.
Good job FlightNetwork for your great service and for hiring Pankaj Guptaüëç!!
